item.title: A Rapid U.S. Military Buildup in the Caribbean: What to Know
item.description: The United States has deployed eight warships, several surveillance planes and one attack submarine to the region as tensions with Venezuela grow.

item.title: Duchess of Kent, Royal Who Comforted a Wimbledon Loser, Dies at 92
item.description: A member of an aristocratic family, she married the Duke of Kent, a cousin of Queen Elizabeth II.

item.title: How a Top Secret SEAL Team 6 Mission Into North Korea Fell Apart
item.description: The 2019 operation, greenlit by President Trump, sought a strategic edge. It left unarmed North Koreans dead.
